pyblockseis.block.Block¶

class Block(choice=None, data=[])[source]¶

Bases: object

Block Choice Seismic Analysis in Python

Parameters

  • choice (Parameter) – parameters required to run the denoiser.

  • data (Stream or) – obspy stream.

  • dt (float) – sampling period required if data is ndarray.

  • num_of_traces (int) – number of time series.
